concept.title: CC-401 Types of Procurement Management Reviews.

conbody.p: The PMR is a tiered program that includes the following:

(a) PMR reviews by the Office of the DASA(P) (ODASA(P)) to Army Headquarters offices for contracting, Army contracting Commands/Activities, and Offices of the Senior Contracting Official (OSCOs). OSCOs not directly involved in the execution of contracts will propose a subordinate contracting activity for supplemental review.
(b) PMR reviews by the HCA to Offices of the Directors of Contracting and other subordinate contracting offices.
(c) PMR reviews by the Directors of Contracting to subordinate contracting offices.
(d) Special assistance, review and assessment, Army-wide, as required.
